snippet: Three children were killed and three injured in cross-fire on Monday when Taliban insurgents attacked a team of American soldiers in southern Afghanistan.
abstract: Three children are killed and three wounded in cross-fire after Taliban insurgents attack American soldiers in southern Afghanistan.

byline.original: By ROD NORDLAND and TAIMOOR SHAH
byline.contributor: Rod Nordland reported from Kabul, and Taimoor Shah from Kandahar, Afghanistan.

lead_paragraph: Three children were killed and three injured in cross-fire on Monday when Taliban insurgents attacked a team of American soldiers in southern Afghanistan.

headline.main: 3 Children Killed in Cross-Fire Between Taliban and U.S.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
